para.about_wallet: What is a wallet? How does it work?
para.linking_google: PFPlay allows you to become a DJ by connecting your Google account!
para.need_google_login: To use this feature, please log in with your Google account
para.logout_confirm: Do you want to log out? If yes, you will be redirected to home

para.auth_quota_exceeded: The limit for this permission has been exceeded
para.no_change_authority: You cannot arbitrarily change the permissions of higher-ranking users.

para.guest_limit: Access is limited as a guest. Connect your Google account to enjoy full services.

para.what_wear: What will you wear to play?

para.freely_host: Host a party with the theme that you want!

Your changes are not saved.

para.copy_completed: Your changes won't be saved. Are you sure you want to leave the party room

para.skip_dj_song: Do you want to skip the current song?

para.locked_queue_by_admin: The current DJ queue is locked by an admin
para.skipped_song_by_admin: According to the admin policy, songs longer than $1 minutes will be automatically skipped
para.dj_in_order: DJing one person at a time from the waiting list, in order
para.played_sequentially: Songs from the top of the playlist are played sequentially, one song per person

para.edit_only_admin: Only Community Manager and above can make edit action
para.noti_deleted: Existing notices will be deleted upon registration!
